Changes cordance appear specific ( i.e. , occur absence clinical improvement ) , frequently precede examiner rating improvement ( Leuchter et al. , 1997 ; Cook et al. , submission ) . In addition , pattern cordance baseline may indicate patient likely respond fluoxetine venlafaxine treatment ( Cook et al. , 1999 ) .
